body.name: St. Ives Clear Skin Lotion - 3-in-1 SPF 25 Face Moisturizer for Acne Prone, Oily, or Combo Skin, Lightweight Sheer Daily Face Lotion with Tea Tree Extract & Witch Hazel, 3 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 3-in-1 ST IVES LOTION & SUNSCREEN: Our lightweight face lotion for women and men with broad spectrum SPF 25 sunscreen hydrates, balances, and protects skin.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS SOOTHE SKIN: St. Ives skin moisturizer lotion, made with 100% natural tea tree extract and witch hazel, is designed to soothe acne blemishes without clogging pores
CRUELTY-FREE BODY WASH: Our cruelty-free St. Ives lotion formula is PETA-certified, paraben-free, and made with plant-based cleansers.
LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATION: This St. Ives cream sunscreen applies sheer on all skin tones and hydrates skin for up to 24 hours.
ABOUT US: At St. Ives, we use 100% natural moisturizers and extracts to bring the joy of nature into our products for skin that glows.
body.description: St. Ives Clear Skin SPF 25 Moisturizer is designed to keep oily to acne-prone skin protected, clear and balanced. This lotion is a 3-in-1 multi-tasker that hydrates, balances, and protects skin. Enjoy all-day lightweight hydration and shine reduction. Our moisturizer is made with 100 percent natural tea tree extract and witch hazel. The SPF 25 provides protection against UV damage, discoloration caused by acne, and early signs of aging. Our Clear Skin moisturizer is alcohol-free and dermatologist-tested, and it won't clog pores. Plus it applies sheer on all skin tones! Simply apply a nickel-sized amount onto clean skin in the morning liberally and evenly 15 minutes before sun exposure. Want more St. Ives solutions for acne- and blemish-prone skin? Try our new range of skincare products made with 100% natural tea tree extract. To help clear acne, use our Spot Treatment or Cleanser, both made with 2% salicylic acid. Our Clear Skin Face Toner works overtime to keep skin clear and help fade discoloration caused by acne. These skin care savers keep skin clean and clear, so you can glow on with your day! St. Ives does not test on animals anywhere in the world and is PETA approved.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: St. Ives Clear Skin 3-in-1 SPF 25 Moisturizer designed for combo, oily and acne-prone skin of all skin tones. This face moisturizer helps protect against UV damage, discoloration caused by acne, and early signs of aging.

100% Natural Tea Tree Extract This face moisturizer is made with 100% natural tea tree extract. A Boost of Science Formulated with SPF 25 to protect against harmful UV rays. Hydrates and Protects Skin Lightweight lotion ideal for oily, combo or acne-prone skin. Nature's Best Free from alcohol and parabens, non-comedogenic.

St. Ives Acne Control Tea Tree Face Cleanser 8 oz St. Ives Acne Control Tea Tree Face Spot Treatment 0.75z St. Ives Clear skin Tea Tree Face Toner 8.5 oz Main Benefit St. Ives Acne Control Cleanser cleanses skin, clears blemishes, and helps prevent new ones from forming. St. Ives Acne Control Spot Treatment starts working instantly to help clear any blemish. St. Ives Clear Skin Face Toner gently brightens, evens tone, and cleanses with 1% vitamin B3 (niacinamide) and micellar technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best for sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: I've tried every sensitive skin sunscreen known to man. This is the best! Some where fine for my skin, but then ran into my eyes and burned when I sweated a lot. This one is wonderful. It smells nice. Moisturizes well, and doesn't burn my eyes. Great product for the price. It's a keeper. So much better than the famous one that costs 3 times as much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars St. Ives, Longtime No See!
reviews.reviewText: In my late teens and early 20’s (yes, they’ve been around quite some time), St. Ives was a staple for self care/pampering. One of the 1st to integrate natural ingredients with reliable products. Been searching for a replacement moisturizer + acne control + SPF and as expected, this doesn’t disappoint. Smells really nice as it dries as well. Welcome back to my skincare regime St. Ives! Will be purchasing again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps troubled skin
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't;g clog pores and provides great moisture to skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but greasy
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping for a spf moisturizer that didn’t feel greasy. I guess it doesn’t look too greasy but I don’t like the feeling. Also smells like sunscreen. But I think it keeps my face clear and moisturized! I love that it’s a 3 in one. great deal too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love This Stuff!
reviews.reviewText: It feels good, smells good, and goes on smoothly. There is nothing not to like about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product and value.
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, smells and works great. Only need a little to do the job. Do need to check the expiration dates when received however, the last order expired before it was even received and a replacement was required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this one. It cuts down on mosquitoes; the scent pleasant, light, and not overwelming; and it protects from the sun. It's a great all around product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Scotch tape on bottle, the expiration date has been shaved off, and has definitely been tampered with. Inspect before using! I'm sending this back!
Me encanta facilonga queda mi piel después de usarla
